wiki.significant_issues: Firelord finds the Centurions in battle with each other (Annihilation: Heralds of Galactus #2, 2007)
wiki.other_members: Many other unknown inhabitants of the [[Negative Zone]]
wiki.bio_text: [[Annihilus]] persuaded the inhabitants of the [[Negative Zone]] that they were on the verge of being erased from existence by the ever expanding positive matter universe, which was crossing into the Negative Zone. They reluctantly joined Annihilus in a quest for survival. He gathered one hundred super powered beings known as the Centurions; they were self-described keepers of the chaotic realms, much like the heroes of [[Earth]], they were a wildly diverse group and possessed among them a verity of innate  and artificial physical, mental, and other worldly powers. On [[Daedalus 5]], a system on the periphery of the [[Kree|Kree Empire]], Annihilus finally employed the Centurions led by Hybelea, as a united strike team. Despite opposing forces that included the likes of [[Nova (Richard Rider)|Nova]] (Richard Rider), [[Gamora]], [[Drax the Destroyer]], [[Ronan the Accuser]], the [[Super Skrull]] and two former Heralds of [[Galactus]], the Centurions assault broke the back of the resisting forces, effectively ending the military phase of the war.

On [[Daedalus 5]], a system on the periphery of the [[Kree|Kree Empire]], Annihilus finally employed the Centurions led by Hybelea, as a united strike team. Despite opposing forces that included the likes of [[Nova (Richard Rider)|Nova]] (Richard Rider), [[Gamora]], [[Drax the Destroyer]], [[Ronan the Accuser]], the [[Super Skrull]] and two former Heralds of [[Galactus]], the Centurions assault broke the back of the resisting forces, effectively ending the military phase of the war.
